summary: The document is a collection of records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, focusing on investigations into Susan HETLIGMAN FRANK and Richard Cyril FRANK. It includes references to internal security matters, particularly concerning China, and details Susan Frank's appearance before the House Committee on Un-American Activities where she invoked the Fifth Amendment. The document is marked by numerous file numbers, dates, and references to FBI and CIA records, indicating a thorough investigation.
key_findings: Released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
Investigations focus on Susan HETLIGMAN FRANK and Richard Cyril FRANK with ties to internal security and China.
Susan Frank invoked the Fifth Amendment before the House Committee on Un-American Activities.
Contains detailed references to FBI and CIA records, file numbers, and dates.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
